Functions for the comparison of two or more independent samples:

{% raw %}

plot_independent_samples[source]

plot_independent_samples(df, plot_type='stripplot', **kwargs)

Handles all the plotting that is currently available for the comparison of two or more independent samples.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

annotate_stats_independent_samples[source]

annotate_stats_independent_samples(ax, df, params)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Functions for the comparisons of a single group to a fixed value:

{% raw %}

plot_one_sample[source]

plot_one_sample(df, plot_type='stripplot', **kwargs)

Handles all the plotting that is currently available for the comparison of one group to a fixed value.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

annotate_stats_one_sample[source]

annotate_stats_one_sample(ax, df, params)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Functions for Mixed-Model ANOVA analyses:

{% raw %}

plot_mma[source]

plot_mma(df, plot_type='boxplot with stripplot overlay', **kwargs)

Handles all the plotting that is currently available for datasets analyzed with a Mixed-Model ANOVA.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
